#!/static/bin/ash
PATH=/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/static/bin:/static/sbin:/opt/bin:/opt/sbin
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams . /etc/rc.subr/colors . /etc/lesslinux/branding/branding.en.sh
for i in /etc/xinitrc.d/[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-*.?? ; do provides="` cat $i | grep '#lesslinux provides' | awk '{print $3}' `" if echo "$skipservices" | grep -q '|'$provides'|' ; then echo "Skipping $provides" else $i start fi done
if xrandr | grep -E '^\s+(640|720|800)x.+\*' ; then xrandr --size 1366x768 || \ xrandr --size 1280x800 || \ xrandr --size 1024x768 || \ xrandr --size 1024x600 fi
# Uncomment to debug # /usr/bin/Terminal & # /usr/bin/xterm & # setxkbmap -rules xorg -model pc105 -layout "$xkbmap" setxkbmap -layout "$xkbmap" esetroot -scale /etc/lesslinux/branding/desktop.jpg ( while true ; do Thunar --daemon done ) & if xdpyinfo | grep -q -i composite ; then sed -i 's/fake transparency=true/fake transparency=false/g' $HOME/.config/cairo-dock/current_theme/cairo-dock.conf else sed -i 's/fake transparency=false/fake transparency=true/g' $HOME/.config/cairo-dock/current_theme/cairo-dock.conf fi xbindkeys & cairo-dock -c & openbox & sad-launcher.sh & # Weird hack! xfct=0 while true ; do sleep 15 if [ "$xfct" -lt 5 ] ; then xfsettingsd --replace xfct=` expr $xfct + 1 ` sleep 15 else sleep 9999999 fi done

#!/static/bin/ash
PATH=/static/bin:/static/sbin:/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin: export PATH
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams . /etc/rc.subr/colors
# check, if the files needed exist - some of those directories are defaults of customers # and not used on normal LessLinux builds
for d in Data Runtime Software Programme Windows-Programme Programs Windows-Programs Lizenzen lizenzen licenses legal ; do [ -d /lesslinux/cdrom/${d} ] && tar -C /lesslinux/cdrom -cf - ${d} | tar -C /lesslinux/data -xf - done for f in liesmich.html readme.html LIESMICH.html README.html Start.exe Start.inf shutdown.bat ; do [ -f /lesslinux/cdrom/${f} ] && tar -C /lesslinux/cdrom -cf - ${f} | tar -C /lesslinux/data -xf - done
